snippet.title: Postknight World: Official Reveal Trailer
snippet.description:
Embark on a cosy RPG as a Postknight Trainee on the path to greatness—well, with plenty of charming distractions along the way!

Set 10 years after Postknight 2, a new adventure unfolds in Maille. Reunite with familiar characters, forge friendships with new companions, journey across distant lands and seas, immerse yourself in diverse cultures, and savor delicious cuisines.

Ready to begin your next adventure? ✨📜

Wishlist Postknight World on Steam and join our community today!

🎮 Wishlist now: 
https://postknight.com/world

💬 Join the discussion: 
https://discord.gg/kurechii
